issue.title: [Rust]: Run tests without requiring environment variables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11026](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11026). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The desured outcome is that developers can now simply run cargo test in a typical checkout without having to mess with environment variables. I think this will lower the barrier to entry for people to contribute.

Building on the work on ARROW-10967 in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8967 ,
